content: I discovered this platform after they released the NVDA perepetual market on Hyperliquid. It is incredible how they managed to start deploying other markets so quickly. Excited for what the futures holds for these instruments!
author: Ryan Tan

content: Bayesian Regression #github #statistics #textbook michael-franke.github.io Bayesian Regression: Theory & Practice - Causal inference
author: Ryan Tan

content: Read this a long time ago, and I still wonder whether this is still viable. Machine Learning models generally tend to not have as much performative power when duration is extended (due to more uncertainty). One thing that I struggled with was trying to build a model that could predict longer duration events reliably. I wonder how far areâ€¦
author: Ryan Tan

content: Ideas that I still constantly think about to this day. Two that stuck with me " Under strong uncertainty, "halvsies" can be an optimal decision. " - helped with taking profits " A backtest is just a single draw of a stochastic process."
author: Ryan Tan

content: Flirting with Models podcast with Jeff Yan, founder of Hyperliquid. Helped me to build an understanding about different trading strategies and how they worked.
author: Ryan Tan
